title: Yeh Rishta
description: The story of a young married couple, Kartik and Naira trying to strike the perfect balance between their family values, personal beliefs and circumstances.

title: Anupama
description: Anupama had to sacrifice a lot to become an ideal wife, daughter-in-law, and mother. After a bitter realisation, she sets out to live on her own terms.

title: Ghum Hai Kisikey
description: Virat sacrifices his love to honour the promise he made to a dying man. Trapped between the past and the present, will he find love beyond the chains of duty?

title: Imlie
description: All Imlie wanted was to create a name for herself in the city. But upon her arrival, she finds herself caught in the middle of Aditya and Malini's love story.

title: Saathiya 2
description: When the Desais ill-treat their maid, Gehna, their youngest son Anant turns out to be her only supporter. Can he help Gehna find her rightful place?

title: Aapki Nazron Ne Samjha
description: Darsh, a blind photographer, crosses path with selfless Nandini. Sparks fly, hearts flutter and a beautiful tale of love begins.

title: Shaurya Aur Anokhi
description: Sparks fly when masked modern-day misogynist Shaurya comes across Anokhi, a headstrong girl. With their clashing ideologies on the line, will opposites attract?

title: RadhaKrishn
description: Radha and Krishna are the epitome of eternal love and sacrifice, transcending eras and emotions. Here's a never-seen-before retelling of this supreme romance.

title: Pandya Store
description: In the era of nuclear families, Dhara uses her entrepreneurial foresight to revive her ancestral business. But can she keep her family united against all odds?

title: Mehndi Hai Rachne Waali
description: Widowed Pallavi is all for family, while loner Raghav, a business magnate, is all for money. One day, these polar opposites clash.

title: The Big Bull
description: During the late '80s, Hemant Shah, the man with the Midas touch, pulled off the biggest hustle that shook India's financial fabric. Inspired by true events.

title: Yeh Hai Chahatein
description: TODAY'S EPI IS DELAYED DUE TO THE COVID-19 SITUATION. Preesha is a doting mother, while Rudraksh is an insensitive Rockstar. When an unfortunate event brings these two at a crossroad, will it be a new beginning?

title: Shaadi Mubarak
description: A widow and an ex-film star, both in their 40s, partner up to start a wedding planning firm. Thus begins a unique tale of self-respect, friendship and love.

title: Ishqbaaz
description: Brothers Shivaay, Omkara and Rudra share an unbreakable bond despite their dysfunctional family. What happens when cupid strikes each of them?

title: Mahabharat
description: The mother of all wars, the epitome of all rivalries, the cauldron of emotions, insecurities, jealousies, and power play - Mahabharat!

title: Pratigya 2
description: Nine years later, Pratigya finds herself conflicted between her duty as a public prosecutor and her emotions as a mother. Which side will she choose?

title: Mahadev
description: He is the supreme being and the destroyer of evil. Witness lord Shiva's story, his avatars, and a union that shaped the universe - his marriage to Parvati.

title: The Falcon and The Winter Soldier
description: NEW EPISODE EVERY FRIDAY AT 12:30 PM. Following the events of “Avengers: Endgame,” Sam Wilson and Bucky Barnes team up in a global adventure that tests their abilities and their patience.

title: Iss Pyar Ko Kya Naam
description: A perfect story of opposites attract, where Khushi, a simple girl and Arnav, an arrogant businessman realise that they cannot live without each other.

title: Yeh Hai Mohabbatein
description: Based on Manju Kapoor's Custody, this is the story of Raman and Ishita, brought together by destiny and their love for Ruhi, Raman's daughter from his ex-wife.

title: Diya Aur Baati
description: Sooraj, a loving husband and a self-made man from a traditional family helps his ambitious wife, Sandhya achieve her dreams of becoming an IPS officer.

title: Yehh Jadu Hai Jinn Ka
description: He lives under the shadow of a djinn while she is blessed with angelic qualities. What turn will Aman and Roshni's life take when the two fall in love?

title: The Tattoo Murders
description: Police officer Aditi must catch a serial killer with just one clue, a scorpion tattoo on the victims. To stop the menace, she must dig into her own past.

title: Shin-chan
description: Shin-chan follows the journey of five-year-old, Shinnosuke "Shin" Nohara and his family, his pet dog Shiro, neighbours, and friends in Kasukabe, Japan.

title: Teri Laadli Main
description: Born as a mute girl into a family that desperately wanted a boy, Bitti struggles for love and acceptance. Will fate reunite her with her guardian angel Akshat?

title: Ek Hazaaron Mein
description: Sisters Maanvi and Jeevika can go to any lengths for each other. Follow the sisters’ journey as they stand by each other and find their soulmates.

title: Naamkarann
description: An illegitimate child, Avni sets out to create an identity for herself amidst numerous hurdles created by her own grandmother, Dayavanti.

title: Nazar
description: Apurva lives under the constant threat of his sister, Mohini, a Daayan. Unaware that he is a Daavansh himself, what will happen when he discovers his powers?

title: Yeh Rishtey Hain
description: Lovebirds Abir and Mishti embark upon the journey called 'life'. Watch them heal the fissures in their family, putting everything on the line, even their love.

title: Angrezi Medium
description: Champak, a simple Mithai-seller, will go to any lengths to fulfil daughter Tarika's dream of studying in London, triggering a chain of hilarious misadventures.

title: Doraemon
description: Trouble seems to follow Nobita around. Fortunately for him, he’s got Doraemon, a trusty cat-type robot from the 22nd century.

title: Kasautii
description: A re-imagination of Anurag and Prerna's poignant romance. Will these star-crossed lovers unite against the odds of betrayal, revenge, and retribution?

title: Pratigya
description: Pratigya, an educated girl has to stand up against various atrocities in her marital home, even as she falls in love with her husband Krishna, a local goon.

title: Amma ke Babu ki Baby
description: Baal-brahmachari wrestler Babu's life turns upside down when he meets Baby, a spoilt city girl. What happens when their destinies collide?

title: Baaghi 3
description: In a twisted turn of events, when a group of deadly terrorists kidnap Ronnie's elder brother in Syria, he sets off on a mission to bring him back.

title: Tanhaji
description: As Aurangzeb captures the Kondhana Fort, Tanhaji Malusare, Shivaji Maharaj's trusted military leader and braveheart, ventures out to win it back.

title: Geet Hui
description: Geet, abandoned by her NRI husband, braves difficulties to find her way in a new city, and in turn finds the love and support of a new family.

title: Siya Ke Ram
description: A classic epic Ramayana, the story of Ram and Sita, retold through the eyes of the righteous, beautiful and brave Sita.

title: Sarabhai Vs Sarabhai
description: The Sarabhais, an affluent Gujarati family in South Bombay, will have you in splits with their idiosyncrasies. Be a part of their crazy lives!

title: Criminal Justice
description: A one-night stand turns into a nightmare when Aditya wakes up covered in blood. All evidence is against him, but he doesn't remember anything. Is he guilty?

title: MasterChef India
description: With celebrity chefs Vikas Khanna, Vineet Bhatia and Ranveer Brar as the judges, country's best home cooks go head-to-head to become the next MasterChef India.

title: Sofia The First
description: Sofia, an adventurous little girl becomes a princess overnight after her mom marries the king.

title: Sapna Babul Ka... Bidaai
description: A story of two sisters, Sadhana and Ragini. Though not related by blood, they share an unbreakable bond that is tested time and again!

title: Laxmii
description: Aasif's belief in logic and science shatters when he gets possessed by a ghost. What starts as a comical journey soon unearths a dark secret.

title: Bahut Hua Sammaan
description: Perpetually failing engineering students Bony and Fundoo get talked into robbing a bank by the campus loon. What follows is something neither anticipated.

title: Rudrakaal
description: Suspended IPS officer Ranjan, aka Cheetah, is on a mission to find his mentor’s killer. Juggling his personal and professional demons, he is in for a surprise.

title: Jana Na Dil Se Door
description: Vividha and Atharva are poles apart, but are struck by cupid. While their contrasting personalities match, their social backgrounds tell a different story.

title: Suhani Si Ek Ladki
description: Average-looking Suhani faces an uphill task of winning her rich and mighty husband, Yuvraaj's love, and be accepted in her marital home.

title: Phineas and Ferb
description: Phineas and Ferb embark on various adventures during their summer vacation, while trying to keep their sister from interfering with their plans.

title: Navya
description: Soft-spoken Navya falls in love with good-natured Anant. They get married after the initial hiccups but life is not all roses!

title: Kulfi Kumar Bajewala
description: Blessed with a nightingale's voice, cute Kulfi is a singing prodigy. After a tragedy strikes, she sets out on a new journey to find her estranged father.

title: Ramayan
description: He was the righteous crown prince of Ayodhya. She was his loyal and brave wife. Relive the magic of Ramanand Sagar's masterpiece.

title: Arjun
description: Meet Arjun, a rebel-cop and the lead of the Emergency Task Force who doesn't mind going the extra mile to ensure justice, even if it takes breaking rules.

title: Savdhaan India - F.I.R.
description: Honest and brave police officers are out to investigate tough cases and nab twisted criminals across the nation. Zurm ka bura time shuru!

title: Veera
description: Can a brother be a mother too? Meet Ranvijay, Veera’s brother who shares an unbreakable bond with her and nurtures her like a mother would.

title: Kyunki Saas
description: Tulsi Virani sets the example of an ideal bahu, and in time steps up to be a righteous matriarch. Watch her traverse the intricacies of a large family.

title: Musakaan
description: The new journey of a grown-up Muskaan takes her to Ronak, a guy who lives on his own terms. Will he pull Muskaan out of the complicated turmoil of her life?

title: Dill Mill Gayye
description: Four interns enter Sanjeevani to become the best doctors. Through heartbreaks, trials and relationships they try to balance their professional duties.

title: Marvel's Ultimate Spider-Man
description: Spider-man's greatest enemies are back and he needs a new team: a team put together by Spider-man himself including Agent Venom, Iron Spider and Scarlet Spider.

title: Pyar Ka Dard
description: Rich Aditya doesn't believe in marriage while small town girl, Pankhuri thinks 'marriage is for keeps.' What will happen when these opposites meet?

title: Sadda Haq
description: Sanyukta battled the male-dominated society and became a mechanical engineer. With love as the only hurdle, can she fulfil her dream of Mission Mars?

title: City of Dreams
description: An assassination attempt triggers a dirty power struggle between the Gaikwad siblings. With the throne at stake, the lines blur between moral and immoral.

title: Mere Angne Mein
description: What happens when Riya steps into Shivam's family and challenges all that is laid down by his strict grandmother, Shanti Devi!

title: Bahu Humari Rajni_Kant
description: Shaan, a scientist creates a robot, Rajni, as a one-stop-solution for humans. When he ends up marrying her, his life becomes a hilarious circus.

title: Karn Sangini
description: Based on the book 'Karna's Wife: The Outcast's Queen', this story is about princess Uruvi's bravery, shattering class barriers, and her immense love for Karn.

title: Mulan
description: Masquerading as a male soldier to protect her father and tested every step of the way, Mulan must harness her inner-strength and embrace her true potential.

title: Piya Rangrezz
description: Sher Singh, a powerful man for the society only worships his mother, Bhanwari Devi. However, his priorities change when the soft-spoken Shraddha enters his life.

title: May I Come in Madam
description: Tired of his intrusive in-laws and lack of privacy with his wife, Kashmira, Sajan finds an escape in his authoritative yet attractive new boss, but has he?

title: Jiji Ma
description: A maternal figure to her younger sister Niyati, Falguni faces every challenge laid down by their nemesis Uttaradevi, to protect her sister from danger.

title: Ek Boond Ishq
description: Strong-willed Tara marries the fiercely troubled Mrityunjay, unaware of his dark past. Will an ounce of love be enough to transform their lives?

title: Total Dhamaal
description: When 50 million bucks are at stake, six eccentric people will do whatever it takes, including braving the wild. Who will win this race against time?

title: Dil Boley Oberoi
description: Omkara Singh Oberoi despises the idea of love in this spin-off on Ishqbaaaz. However, Gauri Kumari Sharma makes him believe in it!

title: Sanjivani
description: Opposites attract but Dr. Sid and Dr. Ishani repel each other. Will their love-hate relationship finally blossom into love?

title: Avengers: Infinity War
description: With the powerful Thanos on the verge of raining destruction upon the universe, the Avengers will have to risk everything to stop him.

title: Kasautii
description: Anurag and Prerna are star-crossed lovers, who time and again meet and separate as their love story gets entwined in the web of love and revenge.

title: Saubhagyavati Bhava
description: A traumatised Jahnvi struggles with her obsessive, abusive husband, Viraj. Can she protect herself when things get out of hand?

title: Prithviraj Chauhan
description: Here's the heroic tale of the celebrated 12th-century ruler of the Indian history, warrior king Prithviraj Chauhan and his love for princess Sanyogita.

title: Lockdown Ki Lovestory
description: Mumbai's Sonam is about to get hitched to Dhruv from Prayagraj. When Sonam's family gets stuck at Dhruv's place due to the lockdown, all hell breaks loose.

title: Baby
description: Post 26/11 Mumbai attacks, a special intelligence task force will stop at nothing to foil another such assault on the Indian soil.
